list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a piece of cloth or similar material, typically oblong or square, attachable by one edge to a pole or rope and used as the symbol or emblem of a country or institution or as a decoration during public festivities.
a small piece of cloth attached at one edge to a pole and used as a marker or signal in various sports.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: jumped the starter's flag, did he?
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: nhảy cờ của người khởi xướng, anh ta có không?

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a variable used to indicate a particular property of the data in a record.
a flat stone slab, typically rectangular or square, used for paving.
a plant with sword-shaped leaves that grow from a rhizome.
mark (an item) for attention or treatment in a specified way.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: “greatfully” would be flagged as a misspelling of “gratefully.”
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: "Tuyệt vời" sẽ được gắn cờ như một vụspelling của "biết ơn".

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of an official in football, soccer, and other sports) raise or throw a flag to indicate a breach of the rules.
provide or decorate with a flag or flags.
(of a person) become tired, weaker, or less enthusiastic.
